url.description: The URL of the resource for which to fetch oEmbed data.

maxwidth.description: The maximum width of the embed frame in pixels.

maxheight.description: The maximum height of the embed frame in pixels.

discover.description: Whether to perform an oEmbed discovery request for non-whitelisted providers.

context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

after.description: Limit response to resources published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

before.description: Limit response to resources published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific ids.

include.description: Limit result set to specific ids.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

filter.description: Use WP Query arguments to modify the response; private query vars require appropriate authorization.

code.description: Limit result set to resources with a specific code.

discount_type.description: Determines the type of discount that will be applied.

expiry_date.description: UTC DateTime when the coupon expires.

individual_use.description: Whether coupon can only be used individually.

product_ids.description: List of product ID's the coupon can be used on.

exclude_product_ids.description: List of product ID's the coupon cannot be used on.

usage_limit.description: How many times the coupon can be used.

usage_limit_per_user.description: How many times the coupon can be used per customer.

limit_usage_to_x_items.description: Max number of items in the cart the coupon can be applied to.

free_shipping.description: Define if can be applied for free shipping.

product_categories.description: List of category ID's the coupon applies to.

excluded_product_categories.description: List of category ID's the coupon does not apply to.

exclude_sale_items.description: Define if should not apply when have sale items.

minimum_amount.description: Minimum order amount that needs to be in the cart before coupon applies.

maximum_amount.description: Maximum order amount allowed when using the coupon.

email_restrictions.description: List of email addresses that can use this coupon.

slug.description: Product slug.

status.description: Product status (post status).

download_limit.description: Amount of times the product can be downloaded.

download_expiry.description: Number of days that the customer has up to be able to download the product.

download_type.description: Download type, this controls the schema on the front-end.

external_url.description: Product external URL. Only for external products.

button_text.description: Product external button text. Only for external products.

in_stock.description: Controls whether or not the product is listed as "in stock" or "out of stock" on the frontend.

backorders.description: If managing stock, this controls if backorders are allowed.

sold_individually.description: Allow one item to be bought in a single order.

purchase_note.description: Optional note to send the customer after purchase.

menu_order.description: Menu order, used to custom sort products.

post_type.description: Return popular posts from specified custom post type(s).

limit.description: The maximum number of popular posts to return.

freshness.description: Retrieve the most popular entries published within the specified time range.

offset.description: An offset point for the collection.

order_by.description: Set the sorting option of the popular posts.

range.description: Return posts from a specified time range.

time_unit.description: Specifies the time unit of the custom time range.

time_quantity.description: Specifies the number of time units of the custom time range.

taxonomy.description: Include posts in a specified taxonomy.

term_id.description: Taxonomy IDs, separated by comma (prefix a minus sign to exclude).

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the object unique to its type.

status.description: A named status for the object.

author.description: The ID for the author of the object.

comment_status.description: Whether or not comments are open on the object.

ping_status.description: Whether or not the object can be pinged.

template.description: The theme file to use to display the object.

alt_text.description: Alternative text to display when attachment is not displayed.

post.description: The ID for the associated post of the attachment.

force.description: Whether to bypass trash and force deletion.

context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

type.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the post type.

taxonomy.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the taxonomy.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific IDs.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

after.description: Limit response to comments published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

author.description: Limit result set to comments assigned to specific user IDs. Requires authorization.

author_exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes comments assigned to specific user IDs. Requires authorization.

author_email.description: Limit result set to that from a specific author email. Requires authorization.

before.description: Limit response to comments published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific IDs.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

parent.description: Limit result set to comments of specific parent IDs.

parent_exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific parent IDs.

post.description: Limit result set to comments assigned to specific post IDs.

status.description: Limit result set to comments assigned a specific status. Requires authorization.

type.description: Limit result set to comments assigned a specific type. Requires authorization.

password.description: The password for the post if it is password protected.

author.description: The ID of the user object, if author was a user.

author_email.description: Email address for the object author.

author_ip.description: IP address for the object author.

author_name.description: Display name for the object author.

author_user_agent.description: User agent for the object author.

date.description: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.

date_gmt.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

parent.description: The ID for the parent of the object.

post.description: The ID of the associated post object.

status.description: State of the object.

force.description: Whether to bypass trash and force deletion.

password.description: The password for the parent post of the comment (if the post is password protected).

email.description: This address is used for admin purposes, like new user notification.

timezone.description: A city in the same timezone as you.

date_format.description: A date format for all date strings.

time_format.description: A time format for all time strings.

start_of_week.description: A day number of the week that the week should start on.

use_smilies.description: Convert emoticons like :-) and :-P to graphics on display.

default_ping_status.description: Allow link notifications from other blogs (pingbacks and trackbacks) on new articles.

default_comment_status.description: Allow people to post comments on new articles.
